A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great film! One of the top Star Wars films thus far! I'm confused about all the hate. I've been a fan since the early 80's and I would think true fans would know a well done Star Wars film when they saw it. Apparently not. The actions scenes are flawless/enthralling. The major plot line is completely original and captivating. I cared about all the characters. There were some really interesting/risky plot twists that all paid off. It was serious\, humorous and had a lot of heart. Mark and Carrie were incredible. What a wonderful tribute to all Star Wars fans. Instant Classic.
